programme.title: Leverage

programme.desc: The team discovers that an antiquities trafficker is using refugee children to smuggle artifacts; Sophie confronts the consequences of her past.

programme.desc: The team tries to get a violent hedge fund manager to reveal information that could lead to Damien Moreau.

programme.desc: The team takes over a mall on Christmas Eve and uncovers a scheme perpetrated by an old nemesis; Eliot goes undercover as Santa Claus; Parker and Hardison are Santa's helpers.

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team infiltrates a government research lab to stop Damien Moreau from auctioning information to international terrorists.

programme.desc: A deaf woman's ability to read lips gets her a job on the FBI surveillance team.

programme.desc: Sue's first assignment involves an anonymous bomb threat at a local oil company; Lucy wants Sue to become her roommate.

programme.desc: Sue and her unit are assigned to protect a visiting dignitary targeted for assassination by terrorists.

programme.desc: Sue cultivates her first FBI informant after Jack and Bobby bust a guy for selling steroids; an office manager is determined to make Myles' life miserable.

programme.title: Sue Thomas F.B.Eye
programme.desc: Sue gets called in after a car theft suspect turns out to be deaf and communicates solely through sign language.

programme.desc: An Eaton's department store manager, who was disliked, is murdered.

programme.desc: A murder investigation is hindered by an uncooperative witness.

programme.desc: Murdoch investigates multiple drownings of single career women.

programme.desc: A delusional woman is the prime suspect in the stabbing of her fiance.

programme.desc: The team members set aside their personal and romantic issues when hackers take over targeted U.S. military aircraft and war ships, pointing the weaponry at American cities.

programme.sub-title: It Isn't the Fall That Kills You

programme.desc: A boy from Ralph's class goes missing after having a run-in with a deadly criminal; Toby comes closer to discovering the identity of Happy's husband.

programme.desc: A simple job at the Los Angeles Natural History Museum turns deadly when thieves steal things from a rare gem exhibit to get the materials they need to make a nuclear bomb.

programme.desc: While in Ireland for Megan's one-year memorial, Walter discovers a natural disaster at a nearby lake has created a poisonous cloud that threatens an entire village; Cabe and Toby try to ease the tension between Tim and Walter.

programme.desc: When Paige's estranged mother stumbles upon a forgotten nuclear reactor precariously close to exploding, she calls on the team for help.
